page.title: 04WINFORD HOSPITAL CONT.
page.content:
{OCCUPATIONAL THERAPY
This began at the hospital in 1940. The staff treat mainly in-patients on the ward, but a few out-patients are seen in the department.
{WARDS { Four of the wards are brick built single-storey buildings which formed the original hospital. A and B wards provide accommodation for children and young women; C and D wards are at present closed ; Wards E to K are the emergency medical service wards built in 1940 for the treatment of service and civilian war casualties.
